;

;大约占世界住宅物业的十分之一从价值上看，这些房屋都受到全球变暖的威胁，其中包括许多远离海岸的房屋。从袭击美国中西部郊区的龙卷风到击碎意大利别墅屋顶的网球大小的冰雹，温室气体排放带来的恶劣天气正在动摇世界上最重要资产类别的基础。

;
;
;
;
;
;
;

;我们的许多封面都是关于世界事件的，但这一张是特写和个人的。

;

;我们的领导者取决于其对累积危害的影响。据估计，到 2050 年，气候变化及其应对措施可能会导致全球住房价值的 9% 消失，相当于 25 万亿美元，比美国每年的;GDP;少不了多少。在山火多发的加利福尼亚州和飓风多发的佛罗里达州，国家支持的“最后手段保险公司”的总风险已从 2017 年的 1,600 亿美元激增至如今的 6,330 亿美元。

;

;然而，我们的封面取决于分解总体并让读者感觉到这个问题是关于他们称之为自己的特定房子的。

;

;我们从一栋豪华的三层家庭住宅开始，沉入地下——这种命运正在等待着一些伦敦房屋，这些房屋建在粘土上，现在粘土随着季节的变化而膨胀和收缩，就像地下的挤压箱一样。;

;或者，更好的是，将房子放在高耸的暴风雨云下怎么样？这是对悬在全球金融体系上空的巨额账单的恰当比喻。该法案由三部分组成：支付维修费用、投资保护和改造房屋以限制气候变化。对于谁应该付钱的问题肯定会有一场激烈的争论。

;

;为了强调全球变暖的主题，我们尝试将我们的房子改造成孤独的北极熊的家。但我们更喜欢这张房子的草图作为搁浅的资产。今天的房地产市场似乎并没有反映出全球变暖的成本。在人们非常担心海平面上升的迈阿密，房价在这十年里上涨了五分之四，远远高于美国的平均水平。有证据表明，房价只有在灾难发生后才会对气候风险做出反应，此时进行预防性投资为时已晚。因此，惯性很可能会带来令人讨厌的意外。

;

;在最后的封面中，我们冲走了半岛背景，留下了风和浪的海景。住房是一种非常重要的资产，在整个经济中不能被错误定价——尤其是因为它对金融体系至关重要。 25万亿美元的法案将会带来问题。但今天不做只会让明天更加痛苦。

;

;超过三分之二的英国人支持修改法律让某人帮助患有绝症的人自杀。辅助死亡很有可能被写入国家法典。马恩岛、泽西岛和苏格兰的法案已经在进行中。工党领袖凯尔·斯塔默 (Keir Starmer) 爵士对此表示同情，并承诺如果他的政党赢得下届大选，议员们将进行自由投票。

;

;允许安乐死的核心理由之一是个人自由。人应该有选择死亡方式和时间的权利。因此，我们的第一个想法集中在控制上。

;
;
;
;
;
;
;

;我们的第一个黑白版本有一个关闭开关，上面有一个病人躺在床上。但这个比喻不成立，因为这也是一个开关，而辅助死亡的一件事是它是不可逆转的。另一个版本显示有人拉动将心电图上的痕迹连接在一起的结。我们中的一些人认为这太令人高兴了，因为它让人想起了在礼物上鞠躬。

;

;个人自由的论点是一个自然的立场对于像《经济学人》这样的自由派报纸，我们第一次用我们的封面来争论是在 2015 年，也就是我成为主编的那一年。当时，我们的设计是一支刚刚熄灭的蜡烛，我们考虑带回该图像，这次是作为一种视觉双关语。

;

;蜡烛兼作一扇门，通向今生并进入……突然间，我们感到困惑。我们的论点并不涉及来世的存在。如果有的话，有信仰的人往往会认为选择结束生命是有罪的。

;

;我们想要一个阈值图像，因为生命的终结确实是最终的转变。但我们无法拥有一张具有;到;任何地方的阈值的图像。

;

;这就是我们的结论。这位凝视着光芒的女子表示，对于某些人来说，从生到死的跨越是一种冷静、理性的选择。

;

;批评者反驳说任何安乐死制度都无法充分保护弱势群体，使他们免受寻求继承权的亲属的伤害，甚至免受寻求削减医疗费用的国家的伤害。然而证据表明，胁迫案件极为罕见。国家应该帮助人们过上好日子，但如果不能，那些真正想死的人不应该被迫受苦。

;

;一种恐惧是一个过于宽松的法律，会造成滑坡。同样令人担忧的是，法律起草得如此严格，以至于忍受无尽痛苦的成年人仍然无法选择自己的命运。

;

;两个早期设计展示了习近平狡猾计划的不同侧面。最好的情况是，它是未来的高科技愿景，充满了机器人、<小>;人工智能;和先进材料。这就是为什么我们有一双机器人手来创建取景器，就好像它们属于一位出色的电影导演一样。不那么仁慈的是，中国国家主席从帽子里变出一只兔子，而在另一张图片中，魔术师的帽子被堆叠起来，形成了一座女帽宝塔。
;
;事实上，习近平的想法既富有远见又神奇，所以我们将 Android 的手、兔子和帽子组合在一个图像中。

;习近平的计划不乏野心。新生产力的年度投资为 1.6 万美元，是五年前的两倍，相当于 2023 年美国所有商业投资的 43%。到 2030 年，某些行业的工厂产能可能会增长 75% 以上。由热衷于创造价值的世界级公司制造，但很大程度上将受到补贴和国家指导的推动。
;
;我们中的许多人喜欢这种组合设计，但其他人则担心封面未解决的矛盾。新生产力是现实还是幻觉？无论如何，我们的时机已经到了。我们将在复活节后的一周以一只兔子为特色。我们尝试了另一种策略。
;
;总体规划的一个问题是，许多新的中国产品必须出口。然而，中国制造业已占全球制造业的31%。这个数字还能高多少？美国肯定会阻止从中国或其他地方的中国公司生产的先进产品的进口。欧洲已经对中国汽车车队消灭其汽车制造商感到恐慌。新兴国家不希望自己的工业发展受到新的“中国冲击”的阻碍。世界已经从 2000 年代的自由贸易时代向前迈进，部分原因在于中国自身的重商主义。

;

;这些想法将我们引向了集装箱和船舶携带它们的。一张展示集装箱长城的图片让人想起这一战略不仅关系到经济增长，还关系到中国的安全。与美国的关系比一年前更加稳定，但仍然脆弱。 Chinese officials are convinced that America will restrict more Chinese imports and penalise more Chinese firms, whoever wins the White House in November. Another design, of a ship loaded up with gambling chips, took us back to the riskiness of Mr Xi's strategy.

;
;
;
;
;
;
;

;Once more we tried to combine two sketches. An armada of container ships, seen from above, looked like a fleet of ballistic missiles.
;
;The aggression was apt. China's lopsided growth model could wreck international trade, ratcheting geopolitical tensions even higher. If it failed, China could stagnate. That thought may comfort America and its allies, who fear an onrush of Chinese goods. It should not: discontented, China may be even more bellicose than if it were thriving.
;
;Many of us liked this cover, but some felt that containers were an old-tech way of representing a high-tech revolution. What's more, this design failed to get across how the new productive forces are Mr Xi's creation.
;
;Those thoughts led us to a third set of ideas.

;

;Mr Xi's master plan rejects the conventional cure for a slowdown—a big consumer stimulus to reflate the economy. Instead he is going for a 21st-century industrial revolution.中国不仅将摆脱对西方技术的依赖，而且将控制新产业的大部分关键知识产权并收取相应的租金。 Multinationals will come to China to learn, not teach.
;
;Accordingly, we made up a design in which he was pressing the reset-button—as if he were voting in the National People's Congress. We also had him parading in front of a Communist Party logo adapted to look like a computer's on-switch. And once again, we combined these two ideas, this time into what was to be our final cover design.

;

;We wanted the focus on Mr Xi because the new productive forces are ideological as well as economic. In recent decades China's technocrats have had a mandate to study global best practice. Today, by contrast, they have been marginalised. Feedback has turned into flattery. Instead, China has come under Mr Xi's centralising rule.
;
;China's president rejects the idea of bailing out speculative property firms or giving handouts to citizens as the kind of ruse the decadent West resorts to.他去年表示，年轻人应该少一些娇惯，要敢于“吃苦”。 Equally, national security now takes precedence over prosperity.中国必须为未来与美国的斗争做好准备，即使要付出代价。 The  ill effects will be felt in China and around the world.

;

;
;Accordingly, we made up a design in which he was pressing the reset-button—as if he were voting in the National People's Congress. We also had him parading in front of a Communist Party logo adapted to look like a computer's on-switch. And once again, we combined these two ideas, this time into what was to be our final cover design.

;;Reddit; priced its shares at $34 ahead of its debut on the New York Stock Exchange, the top end of the price range it had submitted to investors. The social-media platform's ;IPO; was heavily oversubscribed.

;After years of fighting his extradition from Britain and ten months under house arrest, ;Mike Lynch; went on trial in San Francisco over claims that he fraudulently misstated revenues at Autonomy, a software firm that he sold to Hewlett-Packard in 2011 for $10.3bn. ;HP; subsequently took a huge write-down on the value of its acquisition and alleged that Mr Lynch, Autonomy's founder, had deceived the company. The prosecution says it is the biggest case of fraud in Silicon Valley's history. Mr Lynch denies the charge. His defence counters that ;HP; mismanaged Autonomy.

;A rocky road

;

;Under pressure from activist investors, ;Unilever; set out a restructuring plan that could see it shed 7,500 jobs, about 6% of its workforce. The consumer-goods conglomerate is also spinning off its ice-cream division, which includes the Magnum and Ben & Jerry's brands. Ice-cream accounts for 16% of Unilever's sales, but prospects for the business's growth are melting.

;;Apple; reached a $490m settlement over claims that it misled investors in 2018 about strong demand for the iPhone in China. In January 2019 the tech giant admitted that its business in China was struggling. The lead plaintiff in the investors' lawsuit is the pension fund for the English county of Norfolk. Apple denies wrongdoing.

;The Biden administration unveiled sweeping new ;vehicle-pollution rules; which it hopes will ensure that most new cars and light trucks sold in America are either pure-electric or hybrid by 2032.
